definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be disheartened, cowed (cf. Ar. ka0’ka0’a draw back timidly, ka0’a abstain, through timidity)—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְנִכְאָה]] consec. Da 11:30 then shall he be cowed; Pt. [[נִכְאֵה לֵבָב]] Ps 109:16 downhearted (‖[[עָנִי וְאֶבְיוֹן]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[הַכְאוֹת לֵב חַדִּיק]] Ez Eze 13:22; but LXX Targum Co [[הכאבתן]] v. [[כָּאַב]].
